description: When the user feels mentally numb, deeply sad, hopeless, or spiritually disconnected — needing restoration, remembrance, and divine hope.

primary.text_en: Allah does not burden a soul beyond what it can bear...
primary.text_ar: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا...
primary.explanation: If you're going through it — you're built to survive it.

primary.text_en: Say: Nothing will ever happen to us except what Allah has decreed...
primary.text_ar: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا...
primary.explanation: Control is not in your hands — but trust is.

primary.text_en: So you may not grieve over what has escaped you...
primary.explanation: What’s gone wasn’t meant to stay — let it go.

primary.text_en: Indeed, the allies of Allah will have no fear, nor will they grieve.
primary.text_ar: أَلَآ إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
primary.explanation: There is a place of peace — and you are walking toward it.

primary.text_en: Whoever is afflicted with grief or worry, and says... Allah will remove his worry and replace it with ease.
primary.explanation: Grief is real — but help is closer than you think.

primary.text_en: The most severely tested people are the Prophets, then those nearest to them...
primary.explanation: Heavy tests often fall on the beloved — you're not alone.

primary.text_en: A believer’s affair is amazing... if good happens he is grateful, if hardship — he is patient.
primary.explanation: Depression is not failure — it can be your elevation.

primary.text_en: No fatigue, illness, anxiety... affects a believer except that it expiates sins.
primary.explanation: Even unseen pain is accounted for and rewarded.

primary.text_en: The Prophet ﷺ would often say: 'O Turner of the hearts, keep my heart firm upon Your deen.'
primary.explanation: Spiritual instability is human — keep returning.

duas.text_en: O Allah, I am Your servant... my forelock is in Your hand... Your decree upon me is just... I ask You by every name You have named Yourself...
duas.explanation: One of the most powerful duas for worry and distress.

duas.text_en: There is no god but You, Glory be to You! I was indeed among the wrongdoers.
duas.text_ar: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
duas.explanation: This dua lifted a Prophet from darkness — it can lift you too.

reflection: Depression is real. But it’s not the end. Even in your lowest, your heart beats — and that’s dhikr. You’re alive — and that means He’s not done with you. Hold on. Even the Prophet ﷺ was saddened. But Allah never left him — and He won’t leave you.
